summary_ru: Diagram, Table; Presentation slide comparing McKinsey's 12 projected ecosystems and Ecosystemizer's 10 life-area framework, highlighting a shift toward customer-centric ecosystems and a combined ~$70 trillion global revenue pool by 2030…
